name: buffer-pos

0.3.0.name: buffer-pos
0.3.0.description: Copy the current cursor position to the clipboard as the byte offset from the beginning of the edit buffer.

0.2.0.name: buffer-pos
0.2.0.description: Copy the linear buffer position of the caret in the editor.

0.1.0.name: buffer-pos
0.1.0.description: Copy the linear buffer position of the caret in the editor.

readme:
This is a simple package for [atom](https://atom.io) that copies the current
cursor position to the clipboard as a byte offset from the beginning of the
buffer. The default key binding is alt-cmd-c.

    The position is copied to the clipboard in the format <path>:#<offset>.

    /home/user/dev/myproject/file.js:#125

metadata.name: buffer-pos
metadata.description: Copy the current cursor position to the clipboard as the byte offset from the beginning of the edit buffer.
